content.prompt: To help the viewer distinguish between the different scenes depicted on the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel, Michelangelo used

choices.label: hierarchical scale to emphasize the most important figures across the scenes
a detailed depiction of a distinctly different landscape setting for each scene
a painted illusionistic architectural framework separating the scenes
continuous narration within each scene to clarify the series of events
